thread.title: Ex-Mariner of the week: Shin-Soo Choo
thread.title_full: Ex-Mariner of the week: Shin-Soo Choo | The Seattle Times

author: Seattle Times staff
title: Ex-Mariner of the week: Shin-Soo Choo
text:
Ex-Mariner of the week Shin-Soo Choo Outfield, Texas Rangers 
It was one of many regrettable trades during the Bill Bavasi regime when Choo, then a prospect, was sent to the Cleveland Indians in exchange for first baseman/designated hitter Ben Broussard. Choo went on to become a quality player for the Indians and now the Rangers. Choo started off slowly with the Rangers this season, hitting .221 with a .689 OPS and 11 homers and 38 RBI before the all-star break. Since the break, he’s hitting .346 with a 1.028 OPS and 17 doubles, 11 homers and 42 RBI. 
Seattle Times staff
